# Spotlight Six Game Project

This is a TypeScript tower defense-style game using PIXI.js where players control spotlights to catch escaping inmates.

## Project Structure
- `src/` - TypeScript source files
- `dist/` - Built JavaScript files
- `assets/` - Game assets (images, sounds)
- `public/` - Static files (HTML, CSS)

## Development
- Uses TypeScript for type safety
- PIXI.js for 2D graphics rendering
- Webpack for bundling
- Development server with hot reload

## Game Features
- Interactive spotlight controls
- Inmate pathfinding and escape mechanics
- Score system and game progression
- Responsive canvas rendering
